title: Issue with match-making in ranked (Plat elo)
body:
So basically its getting to the end of season where almost everyone queues up for ranked and grinds for the elo/rrewards etc. Now I (and I dont know if its only me) for the past 5 games have had an issue of match-making. Being in plat ive been playing with/against diamonds, plats and the occasional but rare masters. But NOW for some god dam reason out of no where Im now being matched with silver 1/ gold and have now demoted ( though still in plat) 

Help!??!

replies.body:
https://gyazo.com/0120ffc11913b360070a018532f3e06b

Heres a rough estimate at your current MMR which is way below, so either you've been boosted to your current rank or your queueing with below ranks and your under performing. Thats my only idea of the problem considering it is the problem.
Sound like a case of MMR loss and now your MMR is more in that range then plat/dia, ive had similar issues (Though not in plat/dia). Other then that, idk.
